overview:
A seasoned executive and entrepreneur in technology, Nandi has been in Mobile and Internet industries from the early days. His depth of experience in the global mobile marketplace will prove invaluable to Bango’s global expansion.

Prior to joining Bango, Nandi was Sales Director for PocketThis, a Silicon Valley provider of mobile contextualization technology, where he managed tier one carrier and partner relationships across the EU. In 1999 Nandi co-founded SurfKitchen, the leading provider of mobile dynamic user experience (DUE) software. From 1999 to 2003 he drove the company’s business and corporate development efforts globally, helped develop the company’s proposition and go to market strategy, plus securing major operator accounts. Nandi has also served as an entrepreneur in residence with Morning Street Capital, a NY private equity group.

relationships.title: Co-founder /  Board Member / VP Business and Corporate Development
